text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Next up is... Um... What was it again?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's another day off, and as I'm out<n>for a walk, I spot
Special Week. She<n>has a troubled expression on her her<n>
face, so I decide to head her way for<n>a quick chat.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Ah, Trainer! Right now, I'm practicing<n>how to be a tour
guide!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Well, my mom is coming down to visit<n>me. She said she
wanted to see how<n>I'm doing at school!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
So I wanted to give her a quick tour of<n>the area. I have to
look like I know my<n>way around!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: So I've been practicing...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: But I still haven't gotten the hang ofit, haha... Sigh...
choice_data_list: I can help if you want.
I can help if you want.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: R-really?! That'd be great!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
In that case, can you pretend to be<n>my mom? That way, it'll
be closer to<n>the real deal.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yaaay! You're my mom for today—my<n>one-day mom!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And so, Special Week's Special Tour<n>begins with an
interesting start.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Uh... I think it's this way. Actually, it<n>might've been that way.
Yeah, I think<n>that's it.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
D-don't worry! According to my<n>phone, the mall should be
straight<n>ahead!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Wait, I know where we are! I<n>was so focused on the
map that I<n>didn't notice anything else!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Hehe... I come here pretty often!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
This area's really quiet, so it's the<n>perfect place to hide
away and relax!
choice_data_list: This is one of your favorite spots, huh?
This is one of your favorite spots, huh?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Yep! Even if it's nothing like what<n>you'd see back in
Hokkaido.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Being here reminds me of the fact<n>that, despite being so far
from home,<n>my mom and I live under the same<n>sky.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Thinking of her motivates me to put<n>my all into my life here.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
And afterwards, on the way back, I<n>stop by the market.
They make the<n>most amazing pickled veggies.<n>They're
sooo good!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
C'mon, this way! There's actually a<n>shortcut we can take
to get there!

text_block_list.name: Elderly Storekeeper
text_block_list.text: Well, if it isn't Spe! Are you here for<n>the usual?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yes, please! Two jars of your special<n>pickled veggies!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe... The pickled veggies here are<n>perfect—a balanced
mix of sweet and<n>acidic, all while staying super<n>crunchy!
"Special" hardly even covers<n>it! ♪

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Actually, speaking of "special"...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ta-da! Have a cup of my<n>specially-mixed juice!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I made this over at the drink fountain<n>using my patented
mixing method! As<n>for the taste, well... give it a sip and<n>
find out for yourself! ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She places the glass of brown liquid<n>on the table. As I look
at the peculiar<n>concoction, a slew of words come to<n>mind,
but "juice" is not one of them.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I always make sure to throw one of<n>these together
whenever I come here<n>to study with El and the others!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
If one of us nods off or gets a<n>problem wrong, we have to
take a sip!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I'm usually the one who ends up<n>drinking most of it
though... Hahaha...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: This juice tastes just like how youwould imagine! It makes you go"Blegh!" But I kinda like it!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
It contains all the joy, laughter, and<n>excitement that fills this
room<n>whenever we're here. It's special<n>like that.
choice_data_list: Well, I can't say no to that, now can I?
Well, I can't say no to that, now can I?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Of course not! Down the hatch it<n>goes! I'll order a carrot
hamburger<n>steak to help get the taste out of your<n>mouth
afterwards.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
They taste a bit different from the<n>ones my mom makes, but
not in a bad<n>way! Each bite packs its own punch!
choice_data_list: I can't wait to try it!
I can't wait to try it!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe... I think I'll order one for<n>myself too! ♪ Excuse me!
Two carrot<n>hamburger steaks, please!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After our brief lunch break, Special<n>Week continues to show
me around<n>town.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Hm-hm-hmmm. ♪ It's already<n>evening, huh? I guess we
should start<n>heading ba—wait...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ahhhhgh?!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I totally forgot about the tour! We<n>were supposed to go to
the landmark<n>locations, but we ended up going to all<n>my
usual spots!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: It must've slipped my mind<n>somehow... What do I do?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
My mom said she wanted to see how<n>I'm doing here... She
would've been<n>so disappointed by my tour...
choice_data_list:
If that was your goal, I think it was a perfect
tour.

If that was your goal, I think it was a perfect
tour.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: B-but... we didn't even get to go to<n>the mall or see the river...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I thought it'd be good if she knew<n>that I was visiting places
unique to this<n>area...
choice_data_list: She'd be more than relieved if she saw you now.
She'd be more than relieved if she saw you now.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Oh... I think I get it. When I first came<n>here, I couldn't tell left
from right. But<n>now I know enough to find my way<n>around
town!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Thanks, Trainer! I was missing the<n>point this whole time.
Thank you for<n>helping me realize that!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
All right! I'm gonna give my mom a<n>tour only I could ever
give! She'll be<n>happy for sure!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: (Gurgle...)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Eep! My stomach... I relaxed too<n>quickly... Ha... haha...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Um... Oh, right! Since we're already<n>out, do you mind if we
stop by one last<n>place?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I wanna go to my favorite ramen<n>shop! They give you
gargantuan<n>servings!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Uh-huh! Their "Super Gargantuan XXL<n>Ramen" is really
famous! The bowl's<n>bigger than my head!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Anyway, hurry up! Let's get going<n>already!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
If Special Week eats any more than<n>she already has, it
might start to affect<n>her running. I hurriedly follow behind<n>
her to make sure she's kept in<n>check.
